sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 3 : 8 \), then find \((4 i + 6 j ):(6 i + 6 j )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " $$\text{
 It is given that $
 i : j = 3 : 8 $.We need to find the value of }$$
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + 6 j }{6 i + \input[s1v2]{} j }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{4 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 6 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 4 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{8 } \right ) + 6 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{3 }{8 } \right) + 6 }}
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 48 }{8 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 48 }{8 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{12 + 48 }{18 + 48 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{11 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{
 So, the answer is $10 : 11 $.}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [4, 6], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [6, 6], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the expression}$$ \frac{{ \frac{4 i }{j } + 6 }}{{\frac{6 i }{j } + 6 }}
 "}, {"data": [3, 6], "text": " $$\text{Substitute the given ratio of i:j = 3:8, to get the expression $\frac{ 4 \left (\frac{3 }{8 } \right ) + 6 }{6 \left(\frac{3 }{8 } ight) + 6 }$ }$$ 
 "}, {"data": [12, 18], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression $\frac{\frac{12 + 48 }{8 }}{\frac{18 + 48 }{8 }}$
, after multiplying both numerator and denomiator by 3, we get $\frac{12 + 48 }{18 + 48 }$} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [10], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer $\frac{10 }{11 }$.} $$"}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
